name: Mohamed S. Abdelfattah [Tech]
content: Mohamed S. Abdelfattah I am looking for post-docs that are broadly interested in efficient AI hardware or systems. Get in touch and apply to the EmpireAI fellowships at Cornell. × My Office: Bloomberg Center 257 Cornell Tech 2 West Loop Road New York, NY 10044 My research group is investigating how best to build the next generation of machine-learning-centric computer systems. We study methods to co-design and co-optimize neural networks and the hardware on which they run, with a special interest in reconfigurable computing. Our goal is to enable efficient deep learning in both mobile devices and datacenters. Our current research projects include: End-to-end efficiency for large language Models (LLMs). Automated machine learning (AutoML) and neural network compression. New hardware architectures for machine learning. Programmable hardware architectures based on FPGAs.
